questions.body: Scientists have always asked the questions: with so many stars in the universe, are we alone, or is there life out there in space? Have there been visitors to the earth from other planets? Why has no one communicated with us? We do not know the answers... yet.

body_urls.name: df5a1749a0594c429fd76605f7da9621.mp3
body_urls.content: Scientists have always asked the questions: with so many stars in the universe, are we alone, or is there life out there in space? Have there been visitors to the earth from other planets? Why has no one communicated with us? We do not know the answers... yet.

body_urls.name: Q1-4.mp3
body_urls.content: I lost the flowers on a bus this morning.

body_urls.name: Q1-5.mp3
body_urls.content: There are a lot of strange animals here.

groups.title: 二、听对话，记录所缺信息。录音播放前，你将有30秒钟时间读题。录音播放2遍，录音结束后，你将有90秒钟时间完成所有题目。(共5小题，每小题1分，共5分)

title_urls.content: 二、听对话，记录所缺信息。录音播放前，你将有30秒钟时间读题。录音播放2遍，录音结束后，你将有90秒钟时间完成所有题目。(共5小题，每小题1分，共5分)
title_urls.name: 7380b984c6fa42d9a05f.mp3

body_urls.name: Q2.mp3
body_urls.content:
W: Hello! Welcome to the lost and found office. What are you looking for?

M: I lost my computer.

W: We’ve got twenty computers here today. How can we find it?

M: Well, my computer is black…

W: Yes, all the computers are black. Hundreds of people leave computers, cameras and phones on the train. Sometimes we find strange things. Today we have some sausages and a chicken! We don’t know whose they are — are you looking for them, too?

M: No, I’m not. Oh, I have a photo of my son at the back of my computer.

W: Let me see. Is this one yours?

M: Yes it is! Thank you so much.

subs.body: We've got         computers here today.
of people leave computers, cameras and phones on the train.
Today we have some         and a chicken!
Let me see. Is this one         ?

groups.title: 三、听短对话，每段对话有一个问题，请根据所听内容，选择最佳答案。每题录音播放2遍。录音结束后，你将有5秒钟的时间作答。(共5小题，每小题1分，共5分)

title_urls.content: 三、听短对话，每段对话有一个问题，请根据所听内容，选择最佳答案。每题录音播放2遍。录音结束后，你将有5秒钟的时间作答。(共5小题，每小题1分，共5分)
title_urls.name: 1ed05d1e9150440a8742.mp3

body_urls.name: Q3-1.mp3
body_urls.content:
W: Whose football is this? Is it Tony’s?

M: No, his football is under his desk. It’s mine.

questions.body: What will the man do in the evening?

body_urls.name: Q3-2.mp3
body_urls.content:
W: Shall we play ping-pong after school?

M: I’d love to. But I have to go swimming with my brother this evening.

questions.body: Why are the gloves near the dog's house?

body_urls.name: Q3-3.mp3
body_urls.content:
M: I can’t find my gloves. I put them on my bed yesterday.

W: Look! They’re near the dog’s house. Oh, no! It’s your dog again.

body_urls.name: Q3-4.mp3
body_urls.content:
W: Good morning, sir. What can I do for you?

M: I want a coat for my son. He is five years old.

body_urls.name: Q3-5.mp3
body_urls.content:
M: Whose wallets are they?

W: The white one is my aunt’s and the purple one is grandma’s.

groups.title: 四、听下面一段短文，进行朗读。你将有60秒钟时间浏览短文，随后你将听到短文录音，录音播放1遍。录音结束后，你将有90秒钟时间作答。（5分）

title_urls.content: 四、听下面一段短文，进行朗读。你将有60秒钟时间浏览短文，随后你将听到短文录音，录音播放1遍。录音结束后，你将有90秒钟时间作答。（5分）
title_urls.name: 6ab8c0f5923e4b38acf9.mp3

questions.body: Yesterday, my little brother Tom came in my room with his friends. Tom had a snake in a box and he liked the snake very much. When I came back, I found they let the snake out of his box. They couldn't catch him. I had to spend two hours looking for him. Finally, I found him in Mum's shoe! Mum was really angry. She said I shouldn't have a snake for a pet. I think I shouldn't have Tom for a brother!
answer: Yesterday, my little brother Tom came in my room with his friends. Tom had a snake in a box and he liked the snake very much. When I came back, I found they let the snake out of his box. They couldn't catch him. I had to spend two hours looking for him. Finally, I found him in Mum's shoe! Mum was really angry. She said I shouldn't have a snake for a pet. I think I shouldn't have Tom for a brother!

body_urls.name: Q4.mp3
body_urls.content: Yesterday, my little brother Tom came in my room with his friends. Tom had a snake in a box and he liked the snake very much. When I came back, I found they let the snake out of his box. They couldn’t catch him. I had to spend two hours looking for him. Finally, I found him in Mum’s shoe! Mum was really angry. She said I shouldn’t have a snake for a pet. I think I shouldn’t have Tom for a brother!

groups.title: 五、听后记录并转述信息（共10分）
groups.description: 本大题共包含两节。 第一节，听两遍短文，然后根据所听内容和提示将所缺信息补全。你将有60秒钟时间读题，90秒钟时间补全所缺信息。（3-5个空，每空1分，共3-5分，请编辑根据所挖空数量，对分值描述进行相应调整） 第二节，听第三遍短文，然后根据所听内容和提示信息进行转述。你将有2分钟准备时间以及2分钟录音作答时间。（5分）

questions.directions:
本大题共包含两节。 
第一节，听两遍短文，然后根据所听内容和提示将所缺信息补全。你将有60秒钟时间读题，90秒钟时间补全所缺信息。（5个空，每空1分，5分） 
第二节，听第三遍短文，然后根据所听内容和提示信息进行转述。你将有60秒钟准备时间以及2分钟录音作答时间。（5分）

subs.body:
My Grandpa：
When he is 36：He comes to the USA from 1.     .He can't speak English. He studies it hard and 2.     it well.

When he is 3.     ：He opens a 4.     shop for women.Everyday lots of women come to buy dresses. He works late at night.He opens many shops in America. Now：He 5.      me to work hard to be a great man.

body_urls.name: Q5.mp3
body_urls.content: My grandpa is a great man. When he is 36, he moves to USA from China. When he comes to USA, he can’t speak English. But he studies it hard and learns it well. When he is 45, he opens a clothes shop for women.  There are many beautiful dresses in his shop. Everyday, lots of women come to buy dresses they like. He works late at night. Later, he opens many shops in America. He often teaches me to work hard to be a great man.

subs.body: My grandpa is a great man. When he is 36, he moves to USA from …
answer: My grandpa is a great man. When he is 36, he moves to USA from China. When he comes to USA, he can't speak English. But he studies it hard and learns it well. When he is 45, he opens a clothes shop for women.  There are many beautiful dresses in his shop. Everyday, lots of women come to buy dresses they like. He works late at night. Later, he opens many shops in America. He often teaches me to work hard to be a great man.

body_urls.name: Q5.mp3
body_urls.content: My grandpa is a great man. When he is 36, he moves to USA from China. When he comes to USA, he can’t speak English. But he studies it hard and learns it well. When he is 45, he opens a clothes shop for women.  There are many beautiful dresses in his shop. Everyday, lots of women come to buy dresses they like. He works late at night. Later, he opens many shops in America. He often teaches me to work hard to be a great man.
